Detailed Description

IPXactComponentEditor is widget for editing IP-Xact component.

This widget is used to create/edit an IP-Xact component document.

Definition at line 30 of file ipxactcomponenteditor.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IPXactComponentEditor::IPXactComponentEditor ( LibraryInterface *  lh,
const QFileInfo &  xmlLocation,
QSharedPointer< Component >  component,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

The constructor.

Component given to this editor must not be null. If a new component is created then it must be done before calling this editor and then giving pointer to that empty component to this widget.

Parameters:
lh The library handler.
xmlLocation QFileInfo instance that represents the xml-file in the file system. This is needed so relative file paths are set correctly.
component Pointer to the Component-instance that is being edited.
parent Pointer to the owner of this widget.

void IPXactComponentEditor::onItemRemoved ( const QModelIndex &  index  )  [private, slot]

Remove the editors and IPXact elements for specified tree item.

If the given index doesn't yet have an editor created for it then the editor is created for it and instantly destroyed. This happens because the editor takes care of removing the matching IP-Xact model.

Parameters:
index QModelIndex that specifies the editor to remove

void IPXactComponentEditor::setupNullEditor (  )  [private]

Create an empty editor and add it to the widget stack.

This function creates an empty editor widget that is used for the tree items that don't have a direct representation in IP-Xact models.

The null editor is set at index 0.

QMap<void*, ItemEditor*> IPXactComponentEditor::indexes_ [private]

Contains the pointers used to select the correct editor.

Key = Pointer to the model-element that is to be edited. Value = Pointer to the correct editor in the widgetStack.
